data.description: The Personalized Magnetic Wooden Knife Block is a one-of-a-kind gift that will be the perfect addition to any kitchen or cooking station. It is crafted from beautiful walnut wood, with each piece boasting its own unique wood pattern. Inside the wood block are powerful magnetic strips that will hold knives, scissors, and other cutlery accessories in place. The size of the knives doesn't matter as the magnets are powerful enough to prevent sliding. This custom piece is more than just a handsome centerpiece; it's a much-needed kitchen decor accessory that will keep your knives organized and accessible while keeping them sharp for the next night of cooking. The knife block can be personalized with a custom message, the recipient's name or initials, or even a company logo, making it a truly unique and thoughtful gift. It is also easy to clean, requiring only a wipe with a damp cloth, making it convenient to maintain its appearance.

data.description:
This handmade personalized bracelet is made of high quality leather and customizable silver beads, making it a unique and thoughtful gift for your spouse, a friend, or a member of your family. Additionally, these are wonderful presents for birthdays, anniversaries, Christmas, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, and other special occasions.
This personalized bracelet features a handsomely braided band that fastens with a sturdy  magnetic clasp.
★IMPORTANT NOTES:
*If the existing sizes are not suitable for you, we can make bracelets in any size. Simply include the size in the notes to seller or personalization box, or message us.
* Generally, adult men sizes range from 7.5 to 8.5 inches and the most common size is 8 inches.
★ ABOUT THIS ITEM:
Material: 925 Sterling Silver + High Quality genuine leather braid wrist band
Size: From 6" to 8.5" Just let us know if you need different size other than those provided above.
★INSTRUCTIONS FOR CUSTUMIZATION:
Choose the Number of Beads (up to 15 beads)
Write a phrase (up to 15 characters) on each bead and select your symbols from the symbols photo.
Example: 1- Neil 2- Tara 3- Lionel (symbol 3)
Please double-check your grammar and formatting because we will personalize everything exactly as it appears on the screen.
★IS THIS A GIFT?
Don't worry; it is packaged beautifully and is prepared for gift-giving!
If you place multiple orders, we'll bundle everything in a single gift box. If you would like them to be packaged separately in individual gift boxes, please send me a note at the time of purchase.

data.product: Personalized Metal Family Bar and Grill Sign
data.description:
This personalized metal family bar and grill sign is the perfect piece to decorate your home bar or personal grilling space. Celebrate your favorite mixologist or master chef with a sign that shows off their impressive skills.

Personalize this sign with up to three lines of text!

-Dimensions
18" wide x 11" tall x 16g steel
24" wide x 14.5" tall x 16g steel
30" wide x 18" tall x 16g steel
36" wide x 21.75" tall x 16g steel
Custom sizes can also be done. Contact me for any size up to 5 ft x 10 ft!

-Mounting
1/4" Mounting Holes for easy surface mounting

-Finishes
RAW STEEL -DARK (EVEN BLACK) - Raw Steel is a highly recyclable material that gets reused over and over again. This makes the finish and color vary from piece to piece, to sometimes even black. Left untreated, the Raw Steel will rust and develop a natural patina completely unique to your environment.
INDOOR FLAT CLEAR -DARK (EVEN BLACK) - The Indoor Flat Clear finish is an oil-based matte clear coat that makes the steel darker, sometimes even black. This finish will hold up well inside and is easy to clean.
OUTDOOR SILVER - The Outdoor Silver finish is a bright silver powder coat with a slight sparkle. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR GLOSS CLEAR - The Outdoor Gloss Clear finish is a glossy clear powder coat that makes the steel darker, sometimes even black. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR FLAT BLACK - The Outdoor Flat Black finish is a matte black powder coat. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR GLOSS WHITE - The Outdoor Gloss White finish is a glossy white powder coat. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR GLOSS RED - The Outdoor Gloss Red finish is a glossy, bright red powder coat. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
ALUMINUM - The Aluminum finish is the best option if you want the look of shiny metal or stainless steel on a budget. This finish is rust-proof and weather-proof (great for marine environments) and is lightweight. Aluminum is also a soft metal and scratches easily, so please be careful when opening your package.
ALUMINUM POWDER (GLOSS CLEAR, FLAT BLACK, GLOSS WHITE, GLOSS RED) - These Aluminum powder coat finish options will help prevent chips and scratches and give you more color choices. These UV protected finishes will protect the Aluminum in the toughest conditions and help prevent oxidation over time.
GALVANIZED - Galvanized refers to a process in which steel is coated with a layer of zinc to protect it from corrosion. The appearance of galvanized metal is characterized by a shiny, silver-gray surface. The coating gives the material a distinct metallic luster. Over time, the zinc coating may develop a matte gray patina as it weathers, but the initial appearance is typically bright and reflective.

data.product: Iron anniversary gift, 6th anniversary key chain.
data.description: This is a blacksmith hand-forged key chain made from 3/8" wrought iron.  Each one can be personalized with eight characters front and back. These are made and stamped with antique blacksmithing tools! Because of that, each key chain is one of a kind and shows all the hammer marks that come with being hand hammered. They have a wonderful feel in the hand, unlike anything you can buy in the store! These make a great 6th (iron) anniversary gift. Many people like to include a name, ♥6TH♥, or their anniversary date. These are 2 inches long by 3/8" square. The brass ring is 1 inch outer diameter. The finish is a light coat of linseed oil.

data.description: Discover the essence of nautical elegance with this simple yet sophisticated bracelet, crafted from premium-grade sailing rope. Its skin-friendly material and comfortable design make it a delight to wear. The bracelet's size can be effortlessly adjusted with a gentle tug on the knots, ensuring a perfect fit for any wrist. Elevate this accessory to a personal treasure by opting for a custom engraving on the stainless-steel bead, tailored to your desires. This bracelet is not only durable but also completely waterproof, making it an ideal companion for your showers, swims, and active pursuits. Specifications: - Rope thickness: approximately 4 mm - Bead dimensions: roughly 10x20 mm - Adjustable bracelet length: 5.5 to 9 inches. (suitable for nearly all wrist sizes) Color/Material Options: - Sailing rope available in 12 distinct colors, made from high-grade, enduring material sourced from the USA. - Custom Pearl • Silver - High-polished stainless steel • Black - Matte black stainless steel Our superior plating technique ensures lasting color retention. Stainless-steel jewelry is exceptionally sturdy, rust-free, nickel-free, and hypoallergenic, significantly reducing the likelihood of allergic reactions. It maintains its luster without tarnishing or discoloring. Engraving Details: - Engraving available on both sides. - Maximum of 12 characters or 2 symbols per side. - Mix and match text with symbols. - Schwarz 1-seitig means that the pearl is engraved and black on the front side. - Silber 2-seitig means that the pearl is engraved and silver-colored on the front and back sides. - Engraving examples: Anna (G03), on the reverse: H10, or Anna (H01) Lucas Engraving Inspiration: - Names - Words - Dates - Initials - Symbols - Symbols with text - Or opt for no engraving for a classic look Ordering Process: 1. Select your desired options from the drop-down menu. 2. In the note box, specify your engraving wishes and font choice. 3. Add to cart and proceed to checkout. Please Note: - If no font preference is specified, we will choose one for you. - Understand that personalized or custom-made products are not eligible for exchange or return. - To ensure the longevity of your jewelry, we recommend following the included care instructions.

uniqueAttributes.Handcrafted: Every piece of jewelry is lovingly handcrafted to your specifications in our Hamburg workshop. We don't do mass production; each product is made exclusively for you.
uniqueAttributes.Superior materials: We commit to using only high-quality materials. Our sailing rope is premium-grade and sourced from the USA, while our stainless-steel beads are polished and durable.
uniqueAttributes.Customization: Our bracelets stand out with their personalized engraving option. You can add names, words, dates, initials, symbols, or any combination of these to create a truly unique and meaningful piece.
uniqueAttributes.Waterproof: Unlike generic bracelets, ours is completely waterproof, making it an ideal companion for showers, swims, and active pursuits.
uniqueAttributes.Hypoallergenic: Our stainless-steel jewelry is nickel-free and hypoallergenic, significantly reducing the likelihood of allergic reactions. It maintains its luster without tarnishing or discoloring.

data.description: This lamp is handmade in a small boutique studio in Tel Aviv, making each piece unique and one-of-a-kind. The lamp is not just a light fixture but also a contemporary artwork that combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a slight touch of orange-red on top. The lamp's design is inspired by Spanish ceramics and features nine different shapes that can be stacked together to create a variety of unique and eye-catching designs. The lamp is designed to use energy-saving LED light bulbs, making it a more environmentally friendly and cost-effective lighting option. The lamp can be used in various settings, from cozy living rooms to minimalist spaces, and can be ordered in different colors and prints to suit individual preferences.
